sentences.en: A conceptual design and cost study was made by TVA for EPA in 1968.
sentences.cn: 1968年由TVA为EPA做了轮廓设计和成本研究.

sentences.en: Chapters 3, 9, and 10 discuss conceptual - level design principles.
sentences.cn: 第3章 、 第9章和第10章讨论概念层面的设计原则.

sentences.en: Escalation has conceptual affinities with bargaining theory.
sentences.cn: 逐步升级同交易理论在概念上具有相似性.

sentences.en: Even correctly computed results are developed from a conceptual model and not from reality itself.
sentences.cn: 纵然正确地计算得到的后果,也只是从概念化的模型推导出来的而不是从现实本身得到的.

sentences.en: In fact, both of these limiting conditions are more conceptual idealizations than actual physical realities.
sentences.cn: 其实, 这两种极端状态,都是概念中的理想化,而不是实际的物理现实.

sentences.en: In the 50s, Rauschenberg anticipated the conceptual art movement of the 80s.
sentences.cn: 上世纪50年代时，劳申伯格就早早地预见到了80年代的概念艺术运动。

sentences.en: It'solves the conceptual design's knowledge expression, using artificial intelligence method.
sentences.cn: 利用人工智能的方法解决概念设计的知识表达.

sentences.en: Its key personnel by style and training are usually uncomfortable with the conceptual preaches.
sentences.cn: 它的主要人员不论就其作风或所受的训练而言,一般都不善于遵照一定的总体思想去工作.

sentences.en: Liu Lijie's work belongs to the narrative conceptual work.
sentences.cn: 刘丽杰的作品属于叙事性的观念作品.

sentences.en: Much of this conceptual material will become invalid as our knowledge of cardiac function advances.
sentences.cn: 这种概念性的材料中的某些内容,随着对心脏知识研究的进展而成为过时.

sentences.en: The complicated system maybe represented by a simplified conceptual model.
sentences.cn: 简化的理想模型可代替复杂的系统.

sentences.en: the conceptual framework of the play
The micro / macro distinction is also important with respect to the conceptual origin of behavioral relations.
sentences.cn: 微观和宏观区别,在表明行为关系的概念起源方面也颇重要.

sentences.en: The revenues from public services are self - explanatory and raise few conceptual problems.
sentences.cn: 公共服务事业提供收入是理所当然的,不会引起概念上的问题.

sentences.en: The two systems are, at bottom, conceptual models.
sentences.cn: 这两个系统实质上是两种概念模式。

sentences.en: This led to an overestimation of what conceptual thinking could contribute to practical life.
sentences.cn: 这导致人们高估了概念式思考对实际生活的影响.

trans.tran_en: dealing with ideas, or based on them
